docs.title: Summary statistics output file
docs.description: Output file for summary statistics.

docs.title: Average waveform text file
docs.description: Average waveform output text file.

docs.title: Sum waveform text file
docs.description: Sum waveform output text file.

docs.title: Average waveform volume output
docs.description: Average waveform volume output file.

docs.title: Spatial frame average output
docs.description: Spatial frame average output file.

docs.title: Output color table file
docs.description: Output color table with the reported segmentations.

docs.title: mri_segstats
docs.description: Calculates measures and stats derived from brain segmentation data.

docs.title: Segmentation volume
docs.description: Input segmentation volume. This volume's voxel values indicate a segmentation or class.

docs.title: Annotation subject
docs.description: Create a segmentation from hemi.parc.annot. Subject is the name of the subject.

docs.title: Surface label subject
docs.description: Create a segmentation from the given surface label. The points in the label are given a value of 1; 0 for outside.

docs.title: Output file
docs.description: ASCII file in which summary statistics are saved.

docs.title: Partial volume compensation volume
docs.description: Use pvvol to compensate for partial voluming, resulting in more accurate volumes.

docs.title: Input volume
docs.description: Input volume from which to compute more statistics.

docs.title: Erode segmentation
docs.description: Erode segmentation boundaries by Nerodes.

docs.title: Frame number
docs.description: Report statistics of the input volume at the specified 0-based frame number.

docs.title: Robust percentage
docs.description: Compute stats after excluding a percentage of high and low values.

docs.title: Square input
docs.description: Compute the square of the input before computing stats.

docs.title: Square root input
docs.description: Compute the square root of the input before computing stats.

docs.title: Multiply input
docs.description: Multiply input by value.

docs.title: Divide input
docs.description: Divide input by value.

docs.title: Save SNR column
docs.description: Save mean/std as extra column in output table.

docs.title: Absolute value
docs.description: Compute absolute value of input before spatial average.

docs.title: Accumulate mean
docs.description: Save mean*nvoxels instead of mean.

docs.title: Color table file
docs.description: FreeSurfer color table file to specify how each segmentation index is mapped to a segmentation name and color.

docs.title: Use default color table
docs.description: Use default color table from FreeSurferColorLUT.txt.

docs.title: GCA color table file
docs.description: Get color table from the given GCA file.

docs.title: Segmentation IDs
docs.description: Specify numeric segmentation ids.

docs.title: Exclude IDs
docs.description: Exclude the given segmentation id(s) from report.

docs.title: Exclude cortical GM and WM
docs.description: Exclude cortical gray and white matter based on predefined IDs.

docs.title: Surface-based WM volume
docs.description: Compute cortical matter volume based on the white surface volume.

docs.title: Surface-based cortex volume
docs.description: Compute cortical volumes from surface.

docs.title: No global stats
docs.description: Turns off computation of global stats.

docs.title: Report empty segmentations
docs.description: Report on segmentations listed in the color table even if they are not found in the segmentation volume.

docs.title: Output color table
docs.description: Create an output color table with just the segmentations reported.

docs.title: Mask volume
docs.description: Exclude voxels that are not in the mask. Voxels to be excluded are assigned a segid of 0.

docs.title: Mask threshold
docs.description: Exclude voxels that are below thresh, above -thresh, or between -thresh and +thresh.

docs.title: Mask sign
docs.description: Specify sign for masking threshold. Choices are abs, pos, and neg.

docs.title: Mask frame
docs.description: Derive the mask volume from the specified 0-based frame.

docs.title: Invert mask
docs.description: After applying all the masking criteria, invert the mask.

docs.title: Erode mask
docs.description: Erode mask by specified number of iterations.

docs.title: Brain volume from segmentation
docs.description: Get volume of brain as the sum of the volumes of the segmentations that are in the brain.

docs.title: Brain mask volume
docs.description: Load brain mask and compute brain volume from non-zero voxels.

docs.title: Subcortical gray matter volume
docs.description: Compute volume of subcortical gray matter.

docs.title: Total gray matter volume
docs.description: Compute volume of total gray matter.

docs.title: Intracranial volume
docs.description: Compute intracranial volume from talairach.xfm.

docs.title: Intracranial volume only
docs.description: Compute intracranial volume from talairach.xfm and exit.

docs.title: Old intracranial volume only
docs.description: Compute intracranial volume from talairach_with_skull.lta and exit.

docs.title: Talairach transform file
docs.description: Specify path to talairach.xfm file for eTIV.

docs.title: Transform to eTIV
docs.description: Convert xfm to eTIV and write to output file.

docs.title: Euler hole count
docs.description: Write out number of defect holes based on the Euler number.

docs.title: Average waveform file
docs.description: Compute the average waveform and save to text file.

docs.title: Sum waveform file
docs.description: Compute the sum waveform and save to text file.

docs.title: Average waveform volume file
docs.description: Compute average waveform and save to MRI volume.

docs.title: Remove avgwf temporal mean
docs.description: Remove temporal mean from avgwf and avgwfvol.

docs.title: Spatial frame average file
docs.description: Save mean across space and frame.

docs.title: Voxel CRS
docs.description: Replace segmentation with all 0s except at specified voxel.

docs.title: Replace segmentation IDs
docs.description: Replace segmentation ID1 with ID2.

docs.title: Replace IDs file
docs.description: Replace segmentations based on pairs in file.

docs.title: GTM default segmentation merge
docs.description: Replace segmentations based on GTM default.

docs.title: GTM default segmentation merge choroid
docs.description: Replace segmentations based on GTM default excluding choroid.

docs.title: QA statistics file
docs.description: Compute stats useful for quality control.

docs.title: Subjects directory
docs.description: Set SUBJECTS_DIR environment variable.

docs.title: Random seed
docs.description: Set random number generator seed value.

docs.title: mri_segstats
docs.description: Calculates measures and stats derived from brain segmentation data.
